ygData.subject: Re: Spell Resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Then, in the middle of Unrest, you suddendly are ejected from the group. Ok, time to Gate :( -- Vincent ARCHER  -=-=-  Herve Schauer Consultants -=-=-
ygData.messageBody:
According to yur@...:
> I've been in Unrest since lvl 15 and most of my spells are resisted by Dark
> Bones and Dry Bones. But its not so bad as long as your groups are doing fine.
> Just join up and sit there to gain Xp and Loot. no danger since u don't hit the
> mob, so it won't come after u. Just cast it once at start of fight to see if
> its resisted. and then start on the Radiation. I gained a lot Xp and only died
> Once from a skeleton monk that killed someone else and then came after me from
> behind. if they ask you why you aren't helping, just say ur resisted. or just
> cast a few frost shocks to pretend ur helping out :)

Then, in the middle of Unrest, you suddendly are ejected from the group. Ok,
time to Gate :(

--
Vincent ARCHER -=-=- Herve Schauer Consultants -=-=- archer@...
